summary: I'VE BEEN TOLD THAT CHEVROLET BLAZER 97 AND NEWER HAVE BEEN RECALLED FOR BAD WIPER MOTORS.  I OWN A 96 CHEVROLET BLAZER AND NEED TO REPLACE IT ALSO.  THIS HAS BEEN OCCURRING OFF AND ON NOW FOR 6 MONTHS, I THOUGHT IT WAS THE FUSE AT FIRST, SWAPPED VEHICLES, ETC...  NOW I'VE BEEN TOLD THAT THERE WAS A RECALL ON THE 97'S, HOWEVER, I'LL NEED TO PAY FOR MY REPAIR.  SOUNDS LIKE THE SAME PROBLEM TO ME.  I DON'T KNOW WHY THEY AREN'T ALL RECALLED.   *NLM
